doc.title: Rupan sansei: Densetsu no hihou o oe!
doc.plot: It was a quiet night at Lupin's hideout until a guy broke down his door and was accompanied by a woman who informs Lupin that Fujiko has been kidnapped. And if he ever wants to see her again, he must find the "Fountain of Youth". From tall skyscrapers to an ancient castle, Lupin must use his gadgets and trusty Wather P-38 to accomplish his mission.
